oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-03-03 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 3, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Moon Mullican; Minnie Pearl; Jean Shepard; Chet Atkins; Ferlin Husky
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ferlin Husky introduces Moon Mullican -- You Don't Have To Be A Baby To Cry (Moon Mullican) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Jean Shepard -- This Has Been Your Life (Jean Shepard) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Chet Atkins -- San Antonio Rose (Chet Atkins) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Sinful Secret (Ferlin Husky) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D.
